snippet.title: 沉沒意志 Minds Beneath Us - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Minds Beneath Us on Steam right now:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1610440/_/?utm_source=Youtube&utm_content=TeaserTrailer

Hi, we are BearBone Studio. a team of 7 people working together in Taiwan.
This is our first game Minds Beneath Us. It’s been in development since 2020.

Minds Beneath Us is a text-based narrative game set in a not too distant future Taiwan. 
After society has become fully automated with AI, a new industry has emerged that replaces the hardware needed to operate the internet with linked human brains. 
As a result, the most disadvantaged of citizens have had no choice but to put in their bid to sign up, one after another.
Against the stage of this mad society, a mysterious conspiracy gradually unveils.

----------------------------------------------------

🐻Follow or contact us!
E-mail: BearBoneStudio1125@gmail.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BearboneStudio
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BearHouse518/
Discord: https://discord.gg/FPXH26VCKD
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1610440/_/?utm_source=Youtube&utm_content=TeaserTrailer
